name: Psychon 2
description:
The sequel to the 1998 Net Yaroze cult favourite Psychon.

The year is 2116. A robot army has taken over Earth's constellation of orbiting platforms, disintegrated everyone aboard and stolen valuable power crystals.

You must teleport aboard each of the 5 platforms and recover the crystals - but the robot army knows you're coming!

Eliminate anything that stands in your way. Earth is counting on you!

Made with Defold

email : onesevenonegames@gmail.com
